title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\AdvancedMachineFeatures
name: AdvancedMachineFeatures
description:
Specifies options for controlling advanced machine features. Options that would traditionally be configured in a BIOS belong here. Features that require operating system support may have corresponding entries in the GuestOsFeatures of an Image (e.g., whether or not the OS in the Image supports nested virtualization being enabled or disabled).

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.AdvancedMachineFeatures

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.enable_nested_virtualization
params.description: Whether to enable nested virtualization or not (default is false).

params.name: data.enable_uefi_networking
params.description: Whether to enable UEFI networking for instance creation.

params.name: data.threads_per_core
params.description: The number of threads per physical core. To disable simultaneous multithreading (SMT) set this to 1. If unset, the maximum number of threads supported per core by the underlying processor is assumed.

params.name: data.visible_core_count
params.description: The number of physical cores to expose to an instance. Multiply by the number of threads per core to compute the total number of virtual CPUs to expose to the instance. If unset, the number of cores is inferred from the instance's nominal CPU count and the underlying platform's SMT width.
